subject: [Will Read] Modern-day Samurai: Kotaka Sadao - An Appreciation and History of his Kenjutsu Style.
msgSnippet: Many years back we mentioned Dr. Kotaka whose great-grand-uncle is Harada Sanosuke.  He also inherited the sword used by Harada.  Furthermore, Kotaka studied
